name: Giving 'Em Heck [Yogscast Game Jam 2019]
description:
A 48-hour title for the Yogscast Game Jam (part of their Jingle Jam 2019 charity drive). Also my first attempt at a game jam.

The theme was 'Giving', and I also, technically, did the involved 'Foleyship' challenge by only using my own voice for audio.

A somewhat buggy pile of code, but that's part of the fun and I deeply enjoyed the experience.
